gate.creole.ontology

Interface OntologyTripleStoreListener


  • public interface OntologyTripleStoreListener
    An OntologyTripleStoreListener is noticed whenever a triple is added to or removed from the ontology store. Note: at the moment, additions or removals that are not made through direct calls to OntologyTripleStore methods are not fully implemented yet!
    Author:
    Johann Petrak
